votebox

Class AuditoriumParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • votebox.AuditoriumParams
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAuditoriumParams, IVoteboxConstants

    public class AuditoriumParams
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAuditoriumParams, IVoteboxConstants
    This class reads constants from a configuration file specified by client software. It reads in configuration constants from a file with the following format:

    #comment description of constant
    CONSTANT_NAME
    constantValue
    ... more ...
    .............

        Specified by:

      • getCastBallotEncryptionEnabled

        public boolean getCastBallotEncryptionEnabled()
        Specified by:
        getCastBallotEncryptionEnabled in interface IAuditoriumParams
        Returns:
        Returns true if encryption for cast ballots is enabled. This is used to determine the Tallier to use in the Supervisor, and the cast-ballot message to send from VoteBox.

      • getUseEloTouchScreen

        public boolean getUseEloTouchScreen()
        Specified by:
        getUseEloTouchScreen in interface IAuditoriumParams
        Returns:
        Returns true if VoteBox should use SDL to connect toe an Elo touchscreen as an input device. Should only be true on linux, SDL view, framebuffer driven machines. All other configurations are likely to fail, and ungracefully at that.

      • getEloTouchScreenDevice

        public java.lang.String getEloTouchScreenDevice()
        Specified by:
        getEloTouchScreenDevice in interface IAuditoriumParams
        Returns:
        Return the path to the Elo touch screen. Used by SDL to connect to that device for mouse input.
